summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5947 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 6, Barron Addition, being the alley between 19th Avenue Northwest; and 20th Avenue Northwest, from West 80th Street to West 83rd Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 79204, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
